Details: Oh, hello! Guess who we have here!
Note: PopupMessage: hiển thị popup text PopupMessageImage ActionClick: req người chơi hành động Input:req người chơi input

Details: Who am I? I'm Lumi, the one who watches over this land
At the request of your grandmother, I will now hand over this land to you; it is her most treasured possession
You've never tried farming before, have you? Now, I'll help you with a few basic steps
Now, let's go to the shop and buy some seeds to try
Click shop button
This is the seed shop. You can see its description information
Each type of seed will have a different growth time, and plants will go through a total of 5 growth stages
Try clicking to buy one seed
Click buy
Congratulations! You've successfully purchased it. Now, please check your inventory
Click close
Click inventory
Here's the seed you just purchased. Now, let's start planting it!
Click Close
Click Anytile
Click Carrot
That's it! Now you can click on the plant to check when it will grow
Click Carrot plant
This is the time it will take for the plant to grow to the next stage.
Because the plant may need watering, if you don't water it, the plant will stop growing
Sometimes, the plant may also get infected
Or weeds
The plant will continue to grow, but if not treated in time, it will affect the yield
That's it! Now, please continue with your farming. I have a little errand to run, bye bye ~ <3
